response.job_title: Latam Business Intelligence Analyst at Teleperformance | Data Analyst | Chemical Engineering
response.summary:
Business analyst with experience in tracking economic indicators and metrics, as well as in the development of innovation projects. In my current position, I focus on ensuring and tracking the achievement of economic objectives and goals, as well as analyzing key indicators to drive business success. I also have experience in the development of data tracking and visualization tools, as well as in the creation of Marketing tools to improve decision making. 
With my passion for technology, strong background in chemical engineering and project management skills, I offer a unique combination of technical and business skills that allows me to work effectively in multi-disciplinary teams.

Committed to staying on the cutting edge, I am always looking for new opportunities to broaden my knowledge and deepen my understanding of the industry.
response.skills: Business Intelligence (BI), Business Analytics, Robotic Process Automation (RPA), Analytical Skills, Figma (Software), Presentations, Front-End Development, Data Analytics, Data Visualization, Yellow Belt, Microsoft Power BI, Demos, Process Design, Research and Development (R&D), Data Analysis, Conversational AI, Presales, Analytics, Bootstrap, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)

profile_positions.description:
Monitoring the fulfillment of objectives and economic goals at regional level.
Development of a dashboard that visually represents the main performance metrics in real time, enabling quick and informed decision making, both for annual economic compliance and team capabilities.
Creation of marketing tools for the internal sale of technological solutions.
profile_positions.title: Business Intelligence Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Development of disruptive innovation projects focused on improving processes and sales. 
Creation of a customizable demo page for new and old clients, focused on the sale of the company's technological tools.
profile_positions.title: Process Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Monitoring the management projects of the Laboratory Coordination. 
Assist in the generation of new projects to achieve objectives.
Generate budget management and performance reporting.
profile_positions.title: Student Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Monitoring and control of the environmental performance of the processing plants. 
Generation of alerts and improvement actions to environmental indicators. 
Monitoring compliance with environmental requirements defined by environmental entities. 
Leadership in the approach of the project for the collection of usable waste.
profile_positions.title: Environmental Affairs Intern

company.name: Teleperformance
company.description:
Teleperformance is a global digital business services company. Our global scale and local presence allow us to be a force of good in supporting our communities, our clients, and the environment. 
We deliver the most advanced, digitally-powered business services to help the world’s best brands streamline their business in meaningful and sustainable ways.
